Project Description: i have a python script. It is download a file and upload to s3. This part is working. I need to add a file line that it will do gzip to the file and upload that .gz file to s3 as well.
Cover Letter:
I am writing to express my interest in the opportunity to enhance your Python script by adding gzip compression functionality for files before uploading them to Amazon S3. As an experienced Python developer with expertise in file manipulation and AWS services, I am confident in my ability to implement this feature effectively and efficiently.

I have extensive experience in Python scripting and have previously worked on projects involving file compression and AWS S3 integration. Adding gzip compression to the script involves implementing the gzip module in Python to compress files before uploading them to S3. This enhancement will not only reduce storage space and network bandwidth but also improve the overall performance of file transfers.

My approach to implementing this feature would be to integrate the gzip module into the existing script and modify the file upload process to handle compressed files (.gz) appropriately. I will ensure that the script maintains compatibility with the existing functionality while adding the new gzip compression feature seamlessly.

Furthermore, I am familiar with the AWS SDK for Python (Boto3) and have experience in uploading files to S3 buckets programmatically. I will leverage this knowledge to ensure a smooth and efficient integration of the gzip-compressed files with your S3 storage.

I am dedicated to delivering high-quality solutions that meet your requirements and expectations. I am also open to collaborating with your team to ensure that the enhanced script aligns perfectly with your project goals and specifications.

Thank you for considering my application. I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your project and look forward to discussing the details further.
